Body:
I have a BBB revision A5 and would like to fast track AWS-iot testing.

I am thinking of using the BB Green image as this might have some advantages. Can I just download the Grove image and use it?

You will not be able to run the image on the 2 GB Rev A or B eMMCs. The Rev C BBB eMMC have been upgraded to 4 GB and will be able to run the image.

You will be able to run it on the SD card. Most likely the I/O pins will correspond to the Grove Cape for BeagleBone Series and only minor tweaks might be required.

"
